demandpeakall.title: Demand peak - total (MW)
demandpeakall.description: Winter peak demand (sum total of all categories)

ev.title: Electric Vehicles (number)
ev.description: Number of registered plug in electric vehicles (pure and hybrid)

heatpumps.title: Heat Pumps (number)
heatpumps.description: Number of heat pumps per residential household and commercial properties including hybrids

domestic-pv.title: Domestic photovoltaic installed capacity (MW)
domestic-pv.description: Capacity of solar PV panels on domestic roofs for installations less than 4kW

industrial-pv.title: Large solar generation installed capacity (MW)
industrial-pv.description: Installed capacity of industrial and commercial solar farms

windcapacity.title: Wind generation installed capacity (MW)
windcapacity.description: Installed capacity of industrial and commercial onshore and offshore wind farms

renewablegen.title: Renewable generation installed capacity (MW)
renewablegen.description: Installed capacity of all renewable generation including solar PV, wind, biomass, renewable gas engines, hydro

nonrenewablegen.title: Non-renewable generation installed capacity (MW)
nonrenewablegen.description: Installed capacity of all non-renewable generation including CHP, waste incineration, non-renewable engines, other thermal

storage.title: Energy storage installed capacity (MW)
storage.description: Installed capacity of domestic, industrial and commercial batteries

domestic-consumption.title: Domestic underlying energy consumption (MWh)
domestic-consumption.description: Annual energy consumption by residential households excluding electric vehicle and heat pump consumption

industrial-consumption.title: Industrial and commercial underlying energy consumption (MWh)
industrial-consumption.description: Annual energy consumption by industrial and commercial properties excluding electric vehicles and heat pump consumption

totalconsumptioncf.title: Total energy consumption including electric vehicles and heat pumps (MWh)
totalconsumptioncf.description: Total energy consumption by domestic households and industrial and commercial properties including electric vehicle and heat pump consumption

peakdemand.title: Peak demand (MW) at Primary Substations
peakdemand.description: Peak half hourly demand within the year

peakdemandcf.title: Peak demand with customer flexibility (MW) at Primary Substations
peakdemandcf.description: Peak half hourly demand within the year after load shifted by time of use tariffs and smart charging of EVs

peakutilisation.title: Peak utilisation (%) at Primary Substations
peakutilisation.description: Peak half hourly demand within the year as proportion of primary substation capacity

peakutilisationcf.title: Peak utilisation with customer flexibility (%) at Primary Substations
peakutilisationcf.description: Peak half hourly demand within the year as proportion of primary substation capacity after load shifted by time of use tariffs and smart charging of EVs
